page.title: 20BERKELEY VALE
page.content:
Due to the need to position the{power {station}on the{estuary}for easy supply of cooling water, this area has now become very much{dominated}by its presence. The{agricultural}aspects although{reduced}still maintain an important role among the local people. The{River Severn}will always be ever present, and so a{major influence}on the environment and its future development.
====================================== The{authors}of this work were: Chas Andrews, Lee Barnett, Jo Brown, Ricky Coombe, Sherri Edmonds, Martin and Sharon Gregory, Matthew Hammond, Michael Hyam, Rachel Sleigh, Jason Smart, Paul Tuffin, Suzanne Watts, David Woolard. The work was{edited}by Kevin Alexander and Shelagh Hutchings.
